page.title: 12TRADE
page.content:
{BISHOPS NYMPTON SHOP AND POST OFFICE {By Clare Barons
The shop at Bishops Nympton is owned by {Garth and Angee Chanter.}It opens at{8-30am till 1-00pm}for dinner then is open again from{2-00 till 5.30pm The busiest time of the day is at {9-00am}.They are open all the way through the week except for{Saturday {afternoons}and{Sunday.}They have their stock on different days but it depends on the stock ,and they find after a days work they are very tired . There is a {Post Office}as well and Angee works in that and it's open from {8-30am}until{5-30pm}and it's not open on{Wednesday}and{Thursdays.} The papers come very early in the morning at{6-30am}so the people can come and pick them up at{8-30am.
